import React from 'react'; import './Business.css'; // import the Business.css file into your Business component class Business extends React.Component { render() { return (

MarginOtto Pizzeria

{this.business.address}

{this.business.city}

{`${this.business.state} ${this.business.zipCode}`}

{this.business.category}

{`${this.business.rating} stars`}

{`${this.business.reviewCount} reviews`}

); } } export default Business; // make this component available to the rest of the Ravenous app
